en: The children went into the water twice.

ngiemboon: À pfɛ̌ táʼ tá ńké ńgʉa na mèŋ mbà mèŋ n nyě ńzẅíʼte.
en: He has eaten but as for me, I am still waiting.
The children went into the water several times.

ngiemboon: Te zẅíŋ pɔ́ néŋe ngʉ̀a shʉ̀shʉ̀a.
en: Don't accept that they stay away.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zẅǐŋ tà ńcʉ́ʼ pɔ́ ngʉ̀agʉa.
en: I'm old so I'm up for it.
The edge of the basket comes off.
